refnamediv.refpurpose: Eliminates duplicate faces from a BOT solid.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Eliminates duplicate faces from a BOT solid. It returns the number of faces eliminated.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example demonstrates the use of the bot_face_fuse command to eliminate duplicate faces from a BOT primitive.

example.title: Removing duplicate faces from one BOT and storing the results in a new BOT primitive.

listitem.para: Eliminates any duplicate faces from the primitive named bot1_original and stores the result in the new BOT primitive named bot1_fused.
